C

checkForSsn() - Static method in class ContactsManager
Asks for a social security number via the console and then checks if it can find a contact that has that.

The main class for the ContactsApp application.

ContactsManager - Class in Unnamed Package
A class responsible for managing contacts.

ContactsSerializer - Class in Unnamed Package
A utility class for serializing and deserializing contacts to and from a file.
ContactsSerializer() - Constructor for class ContactsSerializer
 
ContactsValidation - Class in Unnamed Package
A utility class for validating contact details such as social security numbers, names, phone numbers, addresses, and email addresses based on specific regex patterns.
ContactsValidation() - Constructor for class ContactsValidation
 
createNewContact() - Static method in class ContactsManager
Creates a new contact by creating a new Person object.

L

loadContactsFromFile() - Static method in class ContactsSerializer

Displays the main menu when at least one contact is available.
menuWithoutContacts() - Static method in class ContactsApp
Displays the main menu when no contacts are available.

P

Person - Class in Unnamed Package
The class Represents a person with contact details including a Finnish social security number, first name, last name, phone number, home address, and email address.

R
